CustomField.description: A lookup to the specific, single-step ("Primitive") Agent Capability that will be executed when the process reaches this node. This capability must have an Implementation Type of 'Standard', 'Apex', or 'Flow'.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select the simple, single-action tool that should run at this step. For example, a node named 'create_case_record' would look up to a primitive capability that uses the 'Standard: CreateRecord' action.
CustomField.label: Primitive Capability To Run
